text: Gerald Wayne Clough (born September 24, 1941) is an American educator and engineer. He was the President Emeritus of the Georgia Institute of Technology (Georgia Tech) and Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution (2008-2015). He retired in October 2014. A graduate of Georgia Tech in civil engineering, he was the first alumnus to serve as President of the Institute. ==References== ==Other websites== *G. Wayne Clough speeches collection from Georgia Tech Archives *Biography of G. Wayne Clough on the Smithsonian website *G.
